name: Jewish Survey Question Bank
description: The Jewish Survey Question Bank (JSQB) is an online database of survey questions used in Jewish social research. Recent years have seen an increasing number of social scientific surveys of the Jewish population, including studies of the Jewish population, program evaluation, public opinion, and more. Open access to the questions used in this research will increase both quality and comparability of future studies, allowing and encouraging researchers to make use of each other's work.
